action-merged: {context, select, CASE_STUDY {Merged case studies} STRATEGY {Merged strategies} other {Merged actions}}
action-name-title: {context, select, CASE_STUDY {Case study title} STRATEGY {Strategy title} other {Action title}}
action-next: {context, select, CASE_STUDY {Next case study} STRATEGY {Next strategy} other {Next action}}
action-previous: {context, select, CASE_STUDY {Previous case study} STRATEGY {Previous strategy} other {Previous action}}
action-status-merged: {context, select, CASE_STUDY {Merged with case study} STRATEGY {Merged with strategy} other {Merged with action}}
action-what-effect-this-has: {context, select, CASE_STUDY {How this case study contributes to the outcome} STRATEGY {How this strategy contributes to the outcome} other {How this action contributes to the outcome}}
actions-updated-help-days: Actions that have been updated within the last {count} days
actions-updated-help-months: Actions that have been updated within the last {count, plural, =1 {month} other {# months}}
feedback-on-action-description: You can leave a comment or feedback on this action
n-more-actions: Plus {count} other {context, select, CASE_STUDY {{count, plural, =1 {case study} other {case studies}}} STRATEGY {{count, plural, =1 {strategy} other {strategies}}} other {{count, plural, =1 {action} other {actions}}}}
action-dependencies: {context, select, CASE_STUDY {Case study dependencies} STRATEGY {Strategy dependencies} other {Action dependencies}}
